name: SquareBoii
description:
Solo project made in ~20-30 hrs by Leon A Becker for the SGDA Game Jam Spring 2018 at UTD.

Game Description (Platformer)

It's ya boii and he's a square. A square boiiiiiiiii. You see shit. You jump over it. You see a portal. You go through it, but first you have to collect all the chad tokens all over the map. Beware each token gives a random effect that will fuck your shit up fam and effects stack as well.  Don't fall off or you start over at the first level. Also remember that you're a square boi, you aint no circle bitch, but you are two triangle BAEs. Anyways, have fun.  If you beat it shoot me a screenshot of the last level :)
